sub_title: Partner at Deloitte | Digital-Enabled Transformation | Management Consulting
summary:
As a LinkedIn member, I welcome opportunities to exchange ideas and information to better serve both my company and clients. Perhaps we can collaborate and share informal networking advice, guidance, and contacts across all facets of operations & strategic leadership, corporate reinvention & improvement, digital-enabled transformation and international business development.

Topics of interest include how to: Maximize revenue, growth, and global success by driving organizational reinvention, positioning for maximum profitability, and overseeing end-to-end technology-enabled initiatives; Achieve performance excellence by initiating insightful strategies, devising and executing account management plans, and leveraging supporting resources. 

Projects we can discuss: Inspiring the identification of previously untapped business opportunities and the development of innovative solutions by collaborating with key stakeholders, forging strong corporate alliances, and transforming underperforming individuals and groups into dedicated teams driven to achieve aggressive goals and objectives; Consistently delivering successful outcomes during times of crisis and uncertainty within the most challenging environments.
 
Please feel free to reach out to me directly via LinkedIn mail or send me an email at pedrosilvapt@gmail.com.

treasury_media.title: Empatia é a resposta. Qual é a pergunta? | Pedro Miguel Silva | TEDxPorto
treasury_media.description: Pedro Miguel Silva defende que temos de ir buscar de volta tempo aos ecrãs para o “devolver” à comunidade de amigos, colegas ou vizinhos. Uma grande parte das tensões políticas e sociais que sentimos hoje deve-se à falta da empatia que se cria quando convivemos diariamente com pessoas de origens, vivências ou comunidades diferentes da nossa. É altura de a ir buscar de volta.

treasury_media.title: Grande Consumo | Global Powers of Retailing 2018
treasury_media.description: Pedro Miguel Silva, Associate Partner de Retail & Consumer Products da Deloitte, aborda os principais temas da edição 2018 do estudo Global Powers of Retailling. Que identifica os 250 maiores retalhistas do mundo e analisa o desempenho obtido pelo setor, ao nível de receita e crescimento, nas várias geografias, segmentos de atividade e formatos de loja. treasury_media.title: O que está a mudar na mesa portuguesa?
treasury_media.description: Fomos perceber o que está a mudar na mesa dos portugueses. Em colaboração com o C-Lab e alguns dos principais agentes do Grande Consumo, analisámos os fatores de contexto e as tendências que estão a alterar os padrões de consumo alimentar em Portugal.

treasury_media.title: Estudo de Natal 2017 - Perceção dos consumidores e hábitos de consumo
treasury_media.description:
Como é que os consumidores avaliam o estado da economia? Qual a evolução do poder de compra face ao ano passado? Quanto esperam gastar este ano entre o Natal e Ano Novo?
Este ano, celebramos o 20º aniversário do Estudo de Natal, no qual analisamos as expetativas, atitudes e comportamentos dos consumidores nesta quadra, na Europa e em Portugal.

Este ano, celebramos o 20º aniversário do Estudo de Natal, no qual analisamos as expetativas, atitudes e comportamentos dos consumidores nesta quadra, na Europa e em Portugal.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Rotary is a global network of 1.2 million neighbors, friends, leaders and problem-solvers who see a world where people unite and take action to create lasting change – across the globe, in our communities, and in ourselves. 
Over 35,000 Rotary clubs in more than 200 geographical areas unite across cultures and occupations addressing illiteracy, disease, hunger, poverty, and lack of clean water. The fervent idea exchange celebrates diverse perspectives and facilitates positive change. 
Passion and engagement abound at Rotary International. In exchange for hard work and dedication, our employees are rewarded with competitive salaries, flexible schedules, comprehensive benefits, and job enrichment. We offer all this and more. Come join us. Visit www.rotary.org to learn more.
